fieldUpdates.name: Check Packaged Box

fieldUpdates.description: Update the Fulfillment Email Template field to None

fieldUpdates.description: Updates Complimentary Magazine,Professional Photography,Extra Person Charge-profile,Supplying own photography, and Additional Magazine Copies owner to Mark
fieldUpdates.name: Update Owner to Mark Schuessler

rules.description: For the shipping correction is needed email alert to work properly this workflow grabs the email of the AM from the order creating the fulfillment and places it in the AM contact field
